The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.

3d4e3b9cf3801a93d1a4af62994900b4f69f2edd
I suggest renaming instances of `Pubkey` to `PubKey` to be consistent with `*PrivKey` functions.
```suggestion
    virtual void GetRootPubKey(std::set<CPubKey>& pubkeys, std::set<CExtPubKey>& ext_pubs) const = 0;
```

be4f46edd8c7199b72d3646a1d13cb66d092e43e
I suggest using an initialization list.

3e53cc298ca1037ad2f52c65934a5e71b76f82bd
Could be reduced to:

```suggestion
            bool ok = std::all_of(dtypes.begin(), dtypes.end(), [](const auto& p) { return p.second == 2; });
```
This presupposes that we will and should allow changing active HD key for a given wallet. I'd like to better understand for what use-cases this is needed.
Probably I don't follow, but it seems we don't need to add all descriptor keys as HD keys to the wallet
